web_snippets: Sir Brian Souter (born 5 May 1954) is a Scottish businessman. With his sister, Ann Gloag, he founded the Stagecoach Group of bus and rail operators.
Growing up on a council estate in Perth, Sir Brian Souter and his sister Dame Ann Gloag could never have imagined that Stagecoach, which they founded in ...
Biography ... Sir Brian Souter co-founded Souter Investments in 2006 with Andy Macfie. He is also the co-founder and former CEO and Chairman of Stagecoach plc.
